result.title: Final publishable report
result.description: The project will prepare final publications that will include important lessons learnt, recommendations, guidance for replicators and detailed information on the project's process as well as signed contracts and contractual arrangements. Any sensitive and confidential information (e.g. prices etc.) can be removed from these contracts if necessary. The final publications should be professionally designed, attractive and tailored to the target group. The publications should be produced in national language and translated in English. An executive summary of the results (max 5 pages) should be made available electronically and in the following languages: English. The content and final draft of the publishable report must be approved by EASME before publication.

result.title: (Standardised) Energy Efficiency Subscriptions for four target groups
result.description: For each target group, a specific Energy Efficiency subscription scheme will be developed, targeted on keeping the up-front investments as low as possible which is enabled by exploiting the district level synergies, whilst keeping the energy ambition high and the price and risk for both the provider and the end user acceptable. The subscription fee will be combined with the energy bill, showing direct insight in the total cost of energy. (Dutch)

result.title: Measurement & Verification tool (M&V)
result.description: The M&V tool will provide the framework for energy data collection, establish independent variables for wide range of facilities, prepare and implement the algorithm for setting the baseline period and energy consumption, set the M&V energy saving formulation, set up principles and rules for M&V implementation costs and define operational and verification issues for M&V. The tool will enable Energy professionals to gain trust of the available M&V tools, examine scenarios and take decisions on Energy Performance Contracting and maintain persistent energy and monetary savings.

result.title: Monitoring & Targeting (M&T) tool for energy analytics
result.description: This Deliverable includes the development of the Monitoring and Targeting (M&T) tools to be used with or without specific facility retrofits in order to “keep operations efficient”, and to “monitor utility costs”. The tool design will its use either online in the project web portal, or offline as an excel based tool, by the trainees of the E&T programme and all interested stakeholders/energy professionals.

result.title: Communication strategy
result.description: "The communication strategy talks in difference to the ""communication plan"" (D2.2) about the outward communication of the Project results to a broader audience. The strategy will inform about the institutions and the individuals to be reached and by what means (i.e. through the EmBuild Website, conference workshops, publications, articles in Newsletters, etc.)"
